title: A Distant Prospect
description: Clashing personalities. Chamber music. Post-War trauma. Is harmony possible?Thrust into a string quartet, crippled Irish cellist Lucy Straughan must choose between isolation and friendship.What has the morose, math-loving Lucy to offer? And will dainty Della Sotheby, hot-headed Pim Connolly and precocious Phoebe Raye ever accept her? But Lucy has more to give than she realises. Nor is she alone in her troubles. Meticulously crafted and true to life, A Distant Prospect is a heartwarming coming-of-age story set in nineteen twenties Sydney, Australia.
author: Annette  Young
